data.name: Train Mechanic Simulator VR - Vive Edition
data.detailed_description:
Train Mechanic Simulator VR for HTC Vive & Oculus Rift

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1452480/Train_Mechanic_Simulator_VR/


About the Game

Take your chances as a real train mechanic in VR. Find locomotives in need of help and repair them in one of the 3 workshops located in a vast open world covering the area of over 6,000 acres. You will face all kinds of damages in all sorts of trains: diesel, electric and even old-school steam units


- 9 trains to repair from all 3 types: steam, electric and diesel


- 6,000 acres of an open world full of railways and various locations


– decide on the strategy of repairs and their return on investment

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Russian, Hungarian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
